suncertify.client

Class BookingTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • suncertify.client.BookingTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    public class BookingTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    A TableModel implementation to model the data stored in a database accessed with a BookingDB implememtation making it available for display in a JTable.
    Author:
    Nick Shrine
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getDateAvailable

        public java.util.Date getDateAvailable(int row)
                                throws InvalidDataFileException
        Returns the date the booking at the specified row is available.
        Parameters:
        row - the row number of the required booking.
        Returns:
        the date the specified booking is available.
        Throws:
        InvalidDataFileException - if the date entry in the database file is in the wrong format.
